name: f'real
description:
From f’real Shakes and Smoothies comes: Shake Run!

Play as a freshly blended f’real milkshake on a speed run through the aisles of an epic, Alternate F’reality convenience store.

Try to keep your cool as you dodge shopping baskets, wayward racks, and bodega cats. Only the fastest reflexes will survive this delicious dash to victory.

Use simple swipe controls to move left or right as you collect flavor boosts, dodge obstacles and whip around corners. Keep running for two minutes to make it to victory. But don’t get too chill, because the game speeds up the longer you play.

Featuring milkshake characters Vanilla Bliss, Chocolate Chill, Cake Batter and Cool Mint Chip, you can switch characters by collecting flavor boosts, or just stick to one shake to gain extra points.

FEATURES

* Simple swipe controls that are easy to use
* Easy to play but hard to win – the game gets harder the longer you run
* Play as 4 different f’real flavors: Vanilla Bliss, Chocolate Chill, Cool Mint Chip, and Cake Batter
* Collect different flavor boosts to switch flavors
* Collect matching flavor boosts for point multipliers! Can you beat your friends’ high scores?
